wikipedia_page.main:
Colin James Alcide (born 14 April 1972) is an English former professional footballer.
He was a Striker from 1991 until 2004 and notably played in the Football League for Lincoln City and Hull City where he had two spells with the Imps and three with the Tigers. He also played professionally for York City, Cambridge United and Exeter City. Alcide played Non-league football for Emley, Altrincham, Gainsborough Trinity and Ashton United with a spell in Wales with TNS.
